Ie 5 5 Beta

11 Nov 1999

According to ZDNet's gossip columnist, IE 5.5 just shipped out to a select group of testers.

\n

\nNew features? A 'print preview' page and a number of bug fixes are said to be included in the new release. What we want to know is, 'Does it finally *fully* comply and support W3 standards???'.

\n

When will MS produce a fully compliant browser and follow the good example of Netscape? Let everyone know what you think by leaving a comment below.
